body.content:
*Dear sir,*

Thank you for entrusting us with your financial needs. I am the Senior
Financial Advisor and procurement manager for Financial Impact Limited, we
have various financial structures that are tailored to meet your financial
obligations, this could be used for a new project, existing project,
business expansion and startups.

Kindly send your project executive summary and other available
documents including a bank statement showing your recent transactions with
your bank, in order to evaluate your creditworthiness to determine your
eligibility for an international project finance loan, also include CIS
(Client Information Sheet).


*Thank you.*

*William James*
*Financial Impact Ltd*
*Basepoint Centre, 70 The Havens,*
*Ipswich, IP3 9BF, Suffolk,*
*United Kingdom*

On Thu, 26 Aug 2021 at 00:02, <orwald@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:

> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Orwald
>
>

header.subject: Re: Hello, how can I help you with this?
